Each dashboard supports: csvs (array), groupBy, seriesBy, valueField, extractYear, minSeriesTotal, maxSeries, topSeriesPerGroup, mapping.
Mappings are optional JSON files in mappings/labels/departments to reuse filters across dashboards.
